definition: valid/counting (as valid)
worker/workshop/(slang) troublesome/high-maintenance (person)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
number/figure/several/CL:個|个[ge4]
frequently/repeatedly

sentences.english: All assignment operators return the value that is assigned to the left operand.
sentences.chinese: 所有的赋值运算符都返回赋给左操作数的值。

sentences.english: The operator must have anl-value as its left operand.
sentences.chinese: 该运算符必须将左值作为其左操作数。

sentences.english: If the character is an operand, push it onto the stack.
sentences.chinese: 如果字符是一个操作数，把它压入堆栈。

sentences.english: The result of the operation is the value of the operand "before" it has been decremented.
sentences.chinese: 该运算的结果是操作数减小“之前”的值。

sentences.english: We can't even elect a president and have every vote count.
sentences.chinese: 我们选总统，不能保证没张投票都作数。

sentences.english: In postfix notation, the operator comes after its operands.
sentences.chinese: 在后缀表示法中，操作符位于操作数后面。

sentences.english: If the character is an operand, append it to the result string.
sentences.chinese: 如果字符是操作数，将它添加到结果字符串。

sentences.english: But if what you bought is a poisonous apple, this experience doesn't count to admire.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你本身买的就是毒苹果，此经验不作数哈。

sentences.english: The expressions created are a combination of arithmetic and logical operators, plus operands.
sentences.chinese: 表达式包含算术和逻辑运算符以及操作数。

sentences.english: The result of the operation is the value of the operand "after" it has been decremented.
sentences.chinese: 该运算的结果是操作数减小“之后”的值。

sentences.english: The compiler supplies the appropriate operand in the assembly language code it generates.
sentences.chinese: 编译器在自己生成的汇编语言中提供了适当的操作数。

sentences.english: Get operands and perform the operation.
sentences.chinese: 获取操作数并执行运算。

sentences.english: In prefix notation, the operator is written before its operands.
sentences.chinese: 前缀表示法中，操作符写在操作数的前面。

sentences.english: Often, the order of operand evaluation has no impact on the result of the expression.
sentences.chinese: 通常，操作数的求值顺序不会影响表达式的结果。

sentences.english: Use whitespace to help binary operators stand out from their operands.
sentences.chinese: 使用空格将二元操作符与它的操作数分开。

sentences.english: In some cases, a single variable may serve as both the input and the output operand.
sentences.chinese: 可以在输入和输出部分中同时使用多个操作数。

definition: to count numbers/to keep to one's word/to hold (i.e. to remain valid)/to count (i.e. to be important)
empty promises
lit. to eat one's words/to break a promise/to go back on one's word/to renege/unsworn testimony
mere verbal statement cannot be taken as proof (idiom)
to write off at one stroke
to swear to God/to cross one's heart
to do as promised/to be as good as one's word/to honor one's word/to mean what one says
to own up to a fault/to admit the truth/to acknowledge a debt
to vow
written pledge/contract/IOU
to sign/to make one's mark
empty words/false words
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

definition: one word worth nine sacred tripods (idiom); words of enormous weight
not to mention ... (i.e. in addition to sth)
a nobleman's word is his bond (proverb)
pinyin: jun1 zi3 yi1 yan2 , si4 ma3 nan2 zhui1
